name: Wild Magic (Agentpdx)
description:
For the GMTK 2020 Gam Jam, this game was created in under 48 hours with the theme, "Out of Control".  Likewise, you play as a cutesy little spellcaster who must time the casting of their spells correctly, lest it ends up failing miserably for them as they attempt to fight off the endless waves of monsters plaguing this unnamed forest.

(If you don't know what to do at the title screen, try clicking on the book off near the bottom-left corner)

Music Used: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JlB7tVDvU7w and https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zediv8HWO4I
